document.full_text: u.s. stocks ended a solid quarter with the barest of moves on thursday, as investors looked ahead to friday's u.s. jobs report to provide a catalyst to push indexes to new highs for the year.
document.title: wall street ends a strong quarter optimistic on payrolls
lines_and_colors: u.s. stocks ended a solid quarter with the barest of moves on thursday, as investors looked ahead to friday's u.s. jobs report to provide a catalyst to push indexes to new highs for the year.
